official_title: A bill to amend section 25 of the Deepwater Port Act of 1974 by providing a permanent authorization of appropriations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation with amendment, S. Rept. 95-145) Amends the Deepwater Port Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations not to exceed $2,500,000 for fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980, respectively for the administration of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 25 of the Deepwater Port Act of 1974 by providing a permanent authorization of appropriations.
